venue: Harben Suite, 3rd Floor Harben House, Tickford Street, Newport Pagnell, MK16 9EY
title: The Ghana Independence Cocktail Party (Milton Keynes)
description: A night, celebrating Ghana's 69th Independence Celebration, with Brother's Band playing live music and DJs The PM, DJ Kudjo and DJ Rexy playing hits old and new. MC: Pacman.
